title: Sales Associate
description: Hi, I'm Natalee Atkins with Huff Realty's Lawrenceburg office.  Born and raised in the Greater Cincinnati area, I developed my deep love and appreciation for Southeastern Indiana at an early age.  Spending time at my grandparent's farm in Cedar Grove was my own personal retreat, my home away from home.  I always vowed I would raise my family here.  Given the opportunity in 2013, my family and I relocated to Dearborn County.  This is one of the best decisions we've made.  It has allowed us to focus more on our familiy, friends, and has given us the space to volunteer as fosters for a Dayton, Ohio dog rescue. While newer to the real estate profession, I have a vast background in customer service, from lending institutions to the nursing field.  I've gained an eye for detail, paying close attention my clients as well as to all aspects of documents and contracts.  I've learned to listen, to your wants, needs, concerns; anything that is important to you.  I've also learned the importance of communication.  This communication allows me to not only find what you are looking for, it also allows me to keep you up to date with what to expect as well as what steps lie ahead. I look forward to working with you in your search for a new home.  If you're looking to list, I'll help to find that special someone who will value and love your home as much as you do.

title: Sales Associate
description: As a seasoned firefighter and paramedic with six years of dedicated service, I've honed my skills in high-pressure situations. A parent to two kids and two stepchildren, owner of five horses, two dogs, a cat, and a mini donkey, I know the value of home. Real estate allows me to blend my love for people with my knack for negotiation. When I'm not closing deals, you'll find me in the stables. I breed and train barrel racing horses—a passion that fuels my competitive spirit. My husband, a Marine veteran who served tours in Iraq and Afghanistan, shares my love for horses. Together, we explore national parks on horseback, creating memories that last a lifetime. Whether it's fighting fires or finding dream homes, I bring unwavering dedication to every task. Life is an adventure, and I'm thrilled to guide you through the twists and turns of the real estate journey.

title: Sales Associate
description: Throughout my 25 years of military and law enforcement experience, I have been blessed with the opportunity to protect and serve a community that I love.  In fact, it is this same care and concern for my fellow neighbor that also led to the pursuit of my real estate license over 16 years ago, and I consider it an honor to also be able to serve and guide you through the process of buying or selling one of your most treasured assets. Taking on the challenges associated with buying and selling a home can feel very overwhelming to say the least, but my primary objective is to ensure that you are treated with the utmost respect and that you understand every aspect of the buying and/or selling process. My honest and straightforward approach will never leave any doubt as to what you should expect, and my knowledge of the business helps me to confidently speak up and to advocate for your best interests. Not only do I value the American dream, it has been my life's purpose to do everything that I can to make this dream a reality for everyone, and I would love to have the chance to put my knowledge and expertise at work so that all of your real estate desires become a reality.

title: Realtor
description: As an agent who's an expert in this local area, I bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise about buying and selling real estate here. It's not the same everywhere, so you need someone you can trust for up-to-date information. I am eager to serve you. Here are some of the things I can do for you: You need someone who knows this area inside and out! I can work with you to find the right home at the right price for you, including all the neighborhood amenities that matter - not to mention the essential criteria you have for your ideal home When it's time to move, you need someone who will advertise your home, show to prospective buyers, negotiate the purchase contract, arrange financing, oversee the inspections, handle all necessary paperwork and supervise the closing. I can take care of everything you need, from start to close. Oftentimes buyers don't visualize living in your home the way you do. I can make your home attractive to its ideal audience - which can help you get top dollar. Things like staging the home, making repairs or minor improvements, or even simply painting the walls can be the difference between a home resting on the market and one that's sold fast.
